member.name: M:Syd.ScheduleControls.BaseScheduleControl.CalculateTimeSlotBounds(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Calculate the time slot bounds. This works out the size and shape that days will take up on the screen. This method is called from OnPaint only when the property BoundsValidTimeSlot is set to false (this property is set to false in cases such as when the control has been resized or the date shown has changed).

member.name: M:Syd.ScheduleControls.BaseScheduleControl.CalculateAppointmentBounds(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Calculate the appointment bounds. This works out the size and shape that the appointments will take up on the screen, and handles any other calculations such as overlaps. This method is called from OnPaint only when the property BoundsValidAppointment is set to false (this property is set to false in cases such as when the control has been resized or the appointment list has changed).

member.summary: Shows a week of appointments.

member.summary: Set up the days to display in this WeekScheduleControl.

member.name: M:Syd.ScheduleControls.WeekScheduleControl.CalculateAppointmentBounds(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Calculate the appointment bounds. This works out the size and shape that the appointments will take up on the screen, and handles any other calculations such as overlaps. This method is called from OnPaint only when the property BoundsValidAppointment is set to false (this property is set to false in cases such as when the control has been resized or the appointment list has changed).

member.name: M:Syd.ScheduleControls.WeekScheduleControl.CalculateTimeSlotBounds(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Calculate the time slot bounds. This works out the size and shape that days will take up on the screen. This method is called from OnPaint only when the property BoundsValidTimeSlot is set to false (this property is set to false in cases such as when the control has been resized or the date shown has changed).
